00044 #include <Inventor/engines/SoEngine.h> 
00045 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h> 
00046 
00047 #include "CmdDeleteTracker.h"
00048 #include "SceneModel.h"
00049 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00050 #include "TGateEngine.h"
00051 #include "TTracker.h"
00052 #include "Trace.h"
00053 
00054 
00055 CmdDeleteTracker::CmdDeleteTracker( const QModelIndex& selectedIndex, SceneModel& model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00056 : QUndoCommand("Delete", parent),  m_pModel(&model)
00057 {
00058         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( selectedIndex );
00059         m_tracker = static_cast< TTracker* > ( instanceNode->GetNode() );
00060         m_tracker->ref();
00061         
00062         SoEngineOutput* gateOutput;
00063         m_tracker->sunRotation.getConnectedEngine( gateOutput );
00064         m_gate = static_cast< TGateEngine* > (gateOutput->getContainer() );
00065         m_gate->ref();
00066         
00067         m_coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( instanceNode->GetParent()->GetNode() );      
00068         m_row = instanceNode->GetParent()->children.indexOf( instanceNode );
00069 }
00070 
00071 CmdDeleteTracker::~CmdDeleteTracker()
00072 {
00073         m_tracker->unref();
00074         m_gate->unref();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void CmdDeleteTracker::undo()
00078 {
00079         Trace trace( "CmdDeleteTracker::undo", false );
00080         if( m_gate )    m_tracker->sunRotation.connectFrom( &m_gate->outputRotation  );
00081 
00082         m_pModel->Paste( tgc::Shared, *m_coinParent, *m_tracker, m_row );
00083 }
00084 
00085 void CmdDeleteTracker::redo( )
00086 {
00087         m_tracker->sunRotation.disconnect( &m_gate->outputRotation );
00088         m_pModel->Cut( *m_coinParent, m_row );
00089         
00090 }
